titleStmt.title: The nevv and admirable arte of setting of corne with all the necessarie tooles and other circumstances belonging to the same: the particular titles whereof, are set downe in the page following.
titleStmt.author: Plat, Hugh, Sir, 1552-1611?

titleStmt.title: The nevv and admirable arte of setting of corne with all the necessarie tooles and other circumstances belonging to the same: the particular titles whereof, are set downe in the page following.
titleStmt.author: Plat, Hugh, Sir, 1552-1611?

publicationStmt.publisher: By Peter Short, dwelling at the signe of the Starre on Bredstreet hill,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: H. Plat Esquire.
Running title reads: The new found arte of setting of corne.
Another issue of STC 19993.5 with quires A and C reset; A2r line 1 of text ends "probablie", line 3 has "newe"; C1r line 7 of text ends "cause", line 11 has "woormes".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
